wikipedia_page.main: Aidan Browne (b. Belfast) is a Northern Irish television presenter and actor.

response: Two of UTV's longest-serving announcers, Julian Simmons and Gillian Porter, were retained to pre-record out-of-vision continuity – with Aidan Browne providing relief cover – until 2 April 2020, when the channel began taking ITV-branded network presentation as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.
* Aidan Browne, television presenter and actor
*Aidan Browne, television presenter; actor; senior lecturer in Performing Arts at the Belfast Metropolitan College
* Aidan Browne, Northern Irish television presenter
